translations: 过伸；伸展过度；腹背训练凳

sentences.sentence: Most frequent mechanism of the injury is hyperextension.
This action will also help prevent hyperextension of your knees.
sentences.translation: 这个动作也将帮预防膝关节超伸。

sentences.sentence: Learn to straighten your knees with full extension of your legs but without hyperextension.
sentences.translation: 学习通过完全伸展你的大腿来伸展你的膝关节，但不超伸。
